summary_gpt: Sheela Foam Limited has allotted 4,782 equity shares under its Employees Stock Option Plan 2022, increasing its total share capital to approximately Rs. 54.36 crore. The shares were issued at face value with no premium, and the allotment details have been duly filed with BSE and NSE.

The filing reports the proceedings of Sheela Foam Limited's Extra-Ordinary General Meeting held via video conference on April 28, 2025, where shareholders approved a draft composite scheme of arrangement involving multiple amalgamations and mergers. The meeting included shareholder voting and scrutiny, with key participants and legal representatives present.

The filing reports the proceedings of Sheela Foam Limited's Extraordinary General Meeting held via video conference on April 28, 2025, where shareholders approved a draft composite scheme of arrangement involving multiple amalgamations and mergers. The meeting included voting results and was conducted under NCLT directives, with participation from key stakeholders and legal representatives.
